input.sentences: we took a family trip to the snow last weekend .
all the kids were excited and running to get their sleds .
the older family decided to walk their happy dogs instead .
i took a family photo with my parents and sisters .
in the end | we had a great meal together .
output.sentences: On the weekend, the family prepared for a trip in the snow.
There would be sledding and running on the trip.
The family was happy to walk the excited dogs in the snow.
The family took a photo to commemorate the event.
They returned home to have dinner.
